pr_title: Muzzle improvements: docs, javadocs, renamings and minor refactoring

timeline.bodyText: 😮 I didn't know about named regex groups!
timeline.author: trask

replies.bodyText: It's a really awesome feature when you're working with large patterns with many groups - although I use them pretty much everywhere, just for the readability benefit 😄
replies.author: mateuszrzeszutek
